data.text: @Malcolm_theCat Wishing mum well. She is very lucky to have you to look after her. 💕🙏🙏
@Malcolm_theCat So very sorry to hear you have Covid.  Hope you get better soon.  At least you have some company! Xx
@Malcolm_theCat Oh, no! Mummy, feel better! I’m so glad you have your sweet furry friends to help. Best wishes.

@Malcolm_theCat Oh my goodness,  I am so sorry your Mum is sick. Please give her my love and I will include her in my prayers. You and Baby Dog be very good to Mum and take good care of her during her illness. ❤️😘🐶🐈🐾🐾🤒😷❤️
@Malcolm_theCat Hope your mom feels good better soon❤️
@Malcolm_theCat I hope your mom feels better soon
@Malcolm_theCat I am so very sorry! I hope you recover quickly! Just wishing you the very best from the US.❤️
@Malcolm_theCat So sorry your mama is so sick. Hope she gets well soon. You two be really good while she’s ill.🥲🥲🙏🙏praying for her.💕💕💕💕
@Malcolm_theCat Malcolm and Baby Dog, thank you for looking after mum as she has the awful covid, hiow she is better real soon, and I'm sure your love and cuddles will help lots!!
